TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MTAThreadAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class MTAThreadAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class MTAThreadAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 表示應用程式的 COM 執行緒模型為多執行緒 Apartment (Multithreaded Apartment，MTA)。

span.span: Indicates that the COM threading model for an application is multithreaded apartment (MTA).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性套用至進入點方法 (`Main()`方法，在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中的)。Apply this attribute to the entry point method (the `Main()` method in C# and Visual Basic). 它有其他的方法沒有作用。It has no effect on other methods. 若要設定您在程式碼中啟動的執行緒的 apartment 狀態，請使用或方法啟動該執行緒之前。To set the apartment state of threads you start in your code, use the or method before starting the thread. > [!NOTE] > 如需 COM 執行緒模型的概觀，請參閱[了解與使用 COM 執行緒模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms809971.aspx)。For an overview of COM threading models, see [Understanding and Using COM Threading Models](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms809971.aspx). 使用 COM interop 應用程式僅適用於 COM 執行緒模型。COM threading models only apply to applications that use COM interop. COM 執行緒模型可以設定為單一執行緒 apartment 或多執行緒的 apartment 中。The COM threading model can be set to single-threaded apartment or multithreaded apartment. 如果執行緒實際上會呼叫 COM 元件，應用程式執行緒只會初始化 COM interop。The application thread is only initialized for COM interop if the thread actually makes a call to a COM component. 如果未使用 COM interop，則尚未初始化執行緒，而屬性，如果有的話，沒有任何作用。If COM interop is not used, then the thread is not initialized, and the attribute, if it is present, has no effect. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，執行緒模型為 COM interop 的預設值取決於您開發應用程式中的，為下表顯示的語言。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, the default threading model for COM interop depends on the language in which you are developing your application, as the following table shows. |語言Language|COM apartment 模型COM apartment model| |--------------|-------------------------| |C#C#|多執行緒的 apartmentMultithreaded apartment| |C++C++|多執行緒的 apartmentMultithreaded apartment| |Visual BasicVisual Basic|單一執行緒 apartmentSingle-threaded apartment| 若要變更這些預設值，您使用屬性來設定應用程式或呼叫的執行緒模型或方法，然後再啟動該執行緒來設定特定的執行緒的執行緒模型。To change these defaults, you use the attribute to set the threading model for the application, or call the or method before starting the thread to set the threading model for a particular thread. 在 c + +，您也可以使用[/CLRTHREADATTRIBUTE （設定 CLR 執行緒屬性）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4907e9ef-5031-446c-aecf-0a0b32fae1e8)連結器選項可指定 apartment 模型。In C++, you can also use the [/CLRTHREADATTRIBUTE (Set CLR Thread Attribute)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4907e9ef-5031-446c-aecf-0a0b32fae1e8) linker option to specify the apartment model. 您要使用之案例的某些設明確的執行緒模型為多執行緒 apartment 的屬性包括下列：Some of the cases in which you want to use the attribute to explicitly set the threading model to multithreaded apartment include the following: - 您正在開發的 Visual Basic 應用程式的 C# 程式庫，接著依賴 COM interop 呼叫。You're developing a Visual Basic app that calls to a C# library that in turn relies on COM interop. 因為多執行緒的 apartment 模型的預設值為 C#，您應該變更應用程式的執行緒模型為多執行緒使用屬性。Because the multithreaded apartment model is the default for C#, you should change your app's threading model to multithreaded by using the attribute. - 您的應用程式會使用多執行緒的 apartment 模式的 COM 元件的呼叫。Your application makes calls to COM components that use the multithreaded apartment model.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
